mapper.select: Select reply_seq, board_seq, originReply_seq, rootReply_seq, content, id, nickName, (TIMESTAMPDIFF(second , regDate, now()) / 60) date, regDate, updateDate, delFlag, likeCount, mainImage, profile from reply where board_seq=#{board_seq} and reply_seq > 0 order by reply_seq asc, originReply_seq asc, rootReply_seq asc limit #{listDTO.skip}, #{listDTO.size}
select count(reply_seq) from reply where board_seq=#{board_seq} and reply_seq>0
mapper.insert: insert into reply (board_seq, content, id, nickName) values (#{board_seq}, #{content}, #{id}, #{nickName})
